channel.title: operation black mesa=black mesa source killer?
channel.description:
guys, check out this site:
[url]https://www.obmsource.com/[/url]
those two videos showcasing model and animation have me downright scared. should we offer to join them now before they take over black mesa source?
opinions urgently needed.
